scripts.server:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx docsify start . -c docs/ssr.config.js --port 3000
scripts.server:dev: npx nodemon --exec 'npx docsify start . -c docs/ssr.config.js --port 3000' --watch docs -e html,js,css,svg
scripts.css:dev: npx nodemon --exec 'npx gulp css' --watch src/scss -e scss
